description:
4/20/2023  – at around 8 :37 a.m. at the intersection of NE 3rd Avenue and NE Main Street.   
 This crash involved a vehicle versus pedestrian with no injuries.  
 Weather was rainy and the pavement surface was wet.  
 
The vehicle was stopped  westbound at a red light on NE Main Street. Driver’s intention was to turn left o n 
NE 3rd. After checking for traffic, driver proceeded with their  turn and stuck pedestrian in the crosswalk.  
 
 Pedestrian  was crossing northbound in crosswalk with a walk signal when they were struck by the turning 
vehi cle.  
 
No citations were issued.  
 Driver said they  failed to see the pedestrian due to rain, dark skies, and dark clothing.

4/28/2023  – at around 7:39 a.m.  at the intersection of NW 185th Avenue and N E Walker Road . 
 This crash involved a vehicle versus a pedestrian. Pedestrian reported no to minor injuries.  
 Weather was clear and the pavement was dry.  
 The pedestrian was crossing from the north to south on NW 185
th when a driver turning right from NE 
Walker Road struck them.  
 Driver immediately stopped to administer aid and offered to take pedestrian to a hospital. Pedestrian told 
driver to “ get away from them and leave them alon e”. Driver then proceeded to leave the scene.  
 No citations were issued.

5/11/2023 – at around 6:14 p.m. at about 250 ft east of the intersection of NW 185th Avenue and NE 
Walker Road.  
 
This crash involved a vehicle versus a bicyclist. Bicyclist was transported with minor injuries.  
 Weather was clear and the pavement was dry.  
 Driver said they  were driving westbound on NE Evergreen Pkwy., driver said they intended to  
turn left into a parking lot to turn  around . Driver said they did not see anything coming, so they made the 
turn. Driver said just as they started into the parking lot they heard a bump, behind them. They said they turned around and  saw the bicyclist on the ground in the bicycle lane. They said they immediately called 
911.  
 The bicycle was riding eastbound in the eastbound bicycle lane when the driver turned their car into the  
path of the bicycle.  
 Driver was cited for dangerous left turn.
